title: Rick Caruso closes in on Karen Bass as L.A. mayor's race tightens, poll finds
dc:creator: Benjamin Oreskes
description: Bass holds a narrow edge, but tens of millions of dollars in negative ads have powered Caruso into striking distance.
content:encoded: Bass holds a narrow edge, but tens of millions of dollars in negative ads have powered Caruso into striking distance.

media:content.media:description: L.A. mayoral candidates Karen Bass and Rick Caruso.
